About1: Fusion Delight is located at San Leandro's Greenhouse Marketplace. Founded by a family who has been in the restaurant business for over 20 years, our latest venture, Fusion Delight, is a modern-day combination of Chinese cuisine, from Hong Kong to Guangzhou to other areas in Asia that feature cultural dishes. Along with our contemporary interior, we aim to provide a unique experience all of our diners.
About2: The first iteration of Fusion Delight started as Delight Garden, which was opened back in 2011, in a different area of the same San Leandro plaza. As time progressed, we aimed to push our customer experience by moving to our location today, with a redesigned interior and more overall space.
About3: We plan to update our interior to the pictures shown to keep our modern, fresh look.
Booking Information: We have two options for parties. The main dining room or the smaller dining room. Please call us and mention booking for more information.
Reservations Q: Do you take reservations? If so, how can I make one?
Reservations A1: For dim sum, we do not take reservations. In order to be certain that your party gets a table, please arrive early and allow the host to give you a number and put your party in the queue.
Reservations A2: For 8 or more people at dinner, please call us at 510-895-1818 or 510-614-1816 and let us know the details. We will hold your reservation for 15 minutes after the scheduled time.
Dim sum Q: Do you serve dim sum during dinner?
Dim sum A: Dim sum is traditionally enjoyed only during brunch time and we want to stay true to original practice. So, we do not serve dim sum during dinner.
Gift A: We do not sell gift cards, but we will consider it in the future!
